00004 
00005 int main(int, const char**)  {
00006 
00007     PluginLoader* pluginLoader = new PluginLoader();
00008     ldmx::UserActionPlugin* plugin = pluginLoader->create("DummySimPlugin", "libSimPlugins.so");
00009     std::cout << "created plugin: " << plugin << std::endl;
00010

00012
